name: Pest Control Simulator 2020
description:
In Pest Control Simulator 2020, you have the unique opportunity to play the role of a hunter of all kinds of pests and parasites. Take up the challenge and clear the town of all unwanted individuals disturbing the peace of the residents.



In the game you will find:
- 10 districts with different tasks and locations,
- 15 species to be neutralized,
- 100+ handmade traps with upgrades.

Find pests, trap them, or fight them with weapons.
At your disposal you have an arsenal of weapons, traps and baits. If this is not enough for you, try your own workshop, which will allow you to design a lot of fancy traps. Experiment with the crafting system, create tools to exterminate and neutralize pests.


Complete missions and gain reputation by unlocking new neighborhoods.
Work in homes, hotels, factories, warehouses and more! Each completed task will increase your reputation and help you get more advanced and better paid jobs. Sell ​​found antiques and other strange things on the black market, to gain funds for the purchase of crafting materials, to upgrade weapons and traps.


Each map has different challenges and different kind of pests to get rid of.
Remember to clean up after any unwanted guests - cover their tracks, get rid of nests and breeding grounds. There are several types of enemies in the game: from ants, through cockroaches, to raccoons. Each pest requires a special approach to catch, neutralize or exterminate it.
